comment: * Model for ambient shadow rendering. Assumes light sources from centroid of the object.

methods.name: public float getEdgeScale()
methods.comment: * Returns scales intensity of the edge of the shadow (opacity) [0-100]

methods.name: public float getShadowBoundRatio()
methods.comment: * Returns scales the area (in xy) of the shadow [0-1]

methods.name: public float getShadowStrength()
methods.comment: * Returns scales the intensity of the entire shadow (opacity) [0-1]

methods.name: public float[] getPolygon()
methods.comment: * Returns opaque polygon to cast shadow

methods.name: public float[] getLightSourcePosition()
methods.comment: * Returns 2D position of the light source
